definition: grown from cuttings planted directly in the ground, cuttings of plants set in the ground to grow as hawthorn for hedges or vines
details:
adjective
- grown from cuttings planted directly in the ground
noun
- cuttings of plants set in the ground to grow as hawthorn for hedges or vines
= example: cuttings of plants set in the ground to grow as hawthorn for hedges or vines
